ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" SONY Super HAD CCD, color DSP, automatic CDS sensor
420 TV Lines horizontal resolution. Weatherproof housing. NTSC system
20 built-in IR illuminators. IR illuminator effective distance up to 54 feet
Built-in f3.6mm lens for wide view angle and built-in microphone and audio circuit
Package included: 4 of SONY CCD cameras, 4 of 12V DC 500mA power supplies, 4 of extension cables and 4 of bonus security warning stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Pack Audio Security Cameras Built-in 1/3'' Sony CCD Outdoor Infrared Day Night Vision Wide Angle Built-in Microphone Weatherproof 20 IR LEDs 3.6mm Lens for Home CCTV DVR Surveillance System with Extension Cables and Power Supplies CK0
